Summary Note:
The RM has known Laurent Nicolas Boucher since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Laurent Nicolas Boucher is a 39 year old and comes from France.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Laurent Nicolas Boucher is married to Louna.
Education Background:
Laurent completed his secondary education at Lycée Ampère in 2004.
Laurent received his degree from HEC Paris in 2010.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 15 years, Laurent Nicolas Boucher has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Laurent Nicolas Boucher began his professional journey as a Family Office Manager at BNP Paribas S.A. in 2010, laying the foundation for future success.
At Société Générale S.A., he held the position of Investment Director from 2016 to 2020, making significant contributions to the organization.
In 2022, he joined BNP Paribas S.A. as a CFO, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 90000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns townhouse in Metz, where he resides. It is worth 1640000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 4170000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Private Equity Manager, in 2018.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Laurent as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
